title: Down to 2 cards for 521 on the Monster

posts.post_title: Down to 2 cards for 521 on the Monster
posts.post_content:
WTB:

I am looking for the following PSA graded cards for the T-206 set:

PSA 3 O'hara (St. Louis - Polar Bear) variation

PSA 1 or better Magie variation

If anyone has either for sale please PM me a scan and price by PayPal F/F.

Thanks,

Bill
